changeSet.author: ntodorovic
changeSet.sql: create sequence campaign_document_seq; create table if not exists campaign_document ( id bigint not null constraint campaign_document_pkey primary key, access_level_id bigint constraint campaign_document_fk_on_access_level references campaign_document_access_level, title varchar(255), type_id bigint constraint campaign_document_fk_on_type references campaign_document_type, upload_date timestamp, url varchar(255), campaign_id bigint constraint campaign_document_fk_on_campaign references campaign );
